short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your buddy for quickly calculating Grades!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that will help you calculate your grades! Just input your grades and their weight to find out what your percentage will be. Can be used to predict grades as well.
